name: Nailer
description:
"As the title suggests, "Nailer" is a game where you just hit a nail."

This is a small game made for "A Game by its Cover"-Jam 2020.

Controls:
Use Hammer/Get Next Nail:
Space-bar / Mouse-Button / Controller-A-Button

Music,Gamegraphics,Programming: Yeff
Gameidea/Concept: 八城 咲空 (Saku Yashiro)

Sounds:  https://freesound.org/
GameEngine: https://unity.com
